job.title: Software Engineer, New Grad (Backend, Full-stack, & ML)
job.description: <strong>At Instabase</strong>, we're passionate about building software to advance the state of the art in computing. We've built a fearlessly experimental, customer-obsessed team who are making discoveries to fundamentally change how people build and consume business applications.<br><br>Today, we're partnering with the world's leading companies to transform how they use data and technology. If these challenges excite you, we'd love to hear from you!<br><br><strong>Our Engineering Team</strong> architects the underlying operating system, core services, platform infrastructure, dev toolkits, core algorithms, machine learning models, packaged end-user apps, and app store marketplace. Instabase engineers are excited to solve hard problems for complex organizations and are self-starters from day one.<br><br><strong>Our Tech Stack</strong> is React and Typescript on the frontend. Our product and infrastructure is written in Go, Python, Java, and C++. We operate using the micro-services model and leverage Docker and Kubernetes for our deployments.<br><br><strong>We're hiring across all teams and technical areas! </strong>This includes Frontend, Product/Full-Stack, Systems, Infrastructure, Machine Learning and AI!<br><br>Interested in learning more? Explore the <strong>Instabase</strong> <strong>product</strong> and read about the <strong>Intern experience </strong>here<strong>.</strong>
